It's like a bad girlfriend. Something tells you to break up it with it but you keep coming back.

The most frustrating, toxic, and cancerous community of all online games in the world. It is also full of hackers with expensive hacking programs that cannot be caught by VAC nor FACEIT AC nor ESEA AC programs. The developers should work on bringing a hack-free update soon. I already spent more than 1200 hours and I know my skill level is really good at this point, but I cant improve or go up in rank when hackers are just flooding the servers and not getting caught. It is utterly disgusting.
